mapper.sql: id as id , createDate as createDate , status as status , creator as creator , lastModDate as lastModDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , name as name , type as type , dictId as dictId , note as note
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gk_university_dict ( createDate, status, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, name, type, dictId, note ) VALUES ( #{createDate}, #{status}, #{creator}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{name}, #{type}, #{dictId}, #{note} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE gk_university_dict
createDate = #{createDate},
status = #{status},
creator = #{creator},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
name = #{name},
type = #{type},
dictId = #{dictId},
note = #{note},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE gk_university_dict
createDate = #{map.createDate},
status = #{map.status},
creator = #{map.creator},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
name = #{map.name},
type = #{map.type},
dictId = #{map.dictId},
note = #{map.note},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gk_university_dict ( createDate, status, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, name, type, dictId, note ) VALUES ( #{map.createDate}, #{map.status}, #{map.creator}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.name}, #{map.type}, #{map.dictId}, #{map.note} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gk_university_dict
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{condition.status} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND name like CONCAT('%', #{condition.name} , '%')
AND type like CONCAT('%', #{condition.type} , '%')
AND dictId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.dictId} , '%')
AND note like CONCAT('%', #{condition.note} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
